messages.subject: Re: Digest Number 148
messages.msgSnippet: ... handwriting?  How much does the quality of your handwriting really affect your life? , I was a doodler.  I
messages.messageBody:
>>>OK, here is a question for all of you. How many people really have NICE
handwriting? How much does the quality of your handwriting really affect
your life? <<<

Prior to my addiction to the internet <g>, I was a doodler. I would practice different styles of print and cursive. I had many beautiful styles of writing. Did this matter in my life, not one iota. Never was my handwriting praised in one of my performance evaluations. However, the doodling did allow me to center myself (meditation?).

Anywho, since I have become a puter junkie, my writing has gone down the toilet. However, my typing skills have increased exponentially.

Regards,

Karen Mowery
MI-unschoolers@onelist.com
